messages.subject: Fold out sleeper chairs anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone know where I can find one of those upholstered foam sleep out chairs that just fold out into a bed for kids? The last time I bought one it was for
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone know where I can find one of those upholstered foam sleep out chairs that just fold out into a bed for kids?

The last time I bought one it was for less than $20 but all the ones I've seen online are 100.00.

Are there any that are cheaper somewhere? My daughter still likes to sleep in our room on the floor next to our bed. We've been using a feather mattress, but it is so bulky and hard to clean up and store. I'd like to get one of these chairs for her since they are lightweight, easy to move, and store.

Thanks!
Kristen

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
